name: automate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make a process in a factory or office operate by machines or computers, in order to reduce the amount of work done by humans and the time taken to do the work

example.eg: Massive investment is needed to automate the production process.
example.egtrans: 要实现生产过程的自动化需要大量的投资。
